column4: Hi, Does anyone know if you can hilight and copy/paste text in a tty? I'd like to stay away from gpm and stick with the keyboard.

if you use screen, you can press alt+a [ , move to the test you want to copy with hjkl, press space to mark one end, move, space to mark the other end, and it will copy the text to a buffer, then you can press alt+a ] to paste it later
if you use byobu, alt+a [ can be replaced with F7
oh, great! thanks, I use both screen and byobu, so I guess I'll have my choice. :)
